name: Nurikabe Vault
description:
A collection of 500 original, hand-crafted nurikabe puzzles.

Nurikabe is a logic puzzle from the inventors of sudoku. Simply build a wall that divides the board into areas given by the numbers. There's only one way to do it!

This collection contains 500 all original, hand-crafted puzzles. Difficulty ranges from merely tricky to utterly fiendish. Sizes range from 6 x 6 to 9 x 11, each with distinct and unique artwork. An animated guide demonstrates the rules and beginning strategies. Optional visual hints point out problems, and a solution is detected immediately.

"...One of the best executed independent iPhone/iPod Touch titles that Game Forward has come across in some time."
-- gamefwd.org
